name: memory-saver
description: Automatically extract and save session memories before context compaction. Preserves key decisions, code changes, user preferences, and pending tasks.

ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.description: Anthropic API key for generating memory summaries

ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL.description: Custom API base URL (optional, for proxy support)

ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_SONNET_MODEL.description: Model to use for memory generation (default: claude-sonnet-4-20250514)
